author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PASS WELL SOUTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PASS WELL SOUTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Jul 27 the center of One-C was located near 11.0, -146.6 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEPRESSION EXPECTED TO PASS WELL SOUTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS... As of 5:00 AM HST Sun Jul 27 the center of One-C was located near 11.0, -146.6 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression One-C (CP1/CP012025)
